EmailTemplate.name: Designated person accept - business
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - {!Associations__c.Child_Licensee_Name__c} agreed to be your Designated {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Associations__c.Child_Licensee_Name__c} agreed to be a Designated {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} for {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
You may now print an updated license.
Get and print your license with our new online system:
Go to {!Associations__c.License_Portal_URL__c}. Login or create an account and follow instructions.
Please call or email us if you need us to send you a printed copy.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP003
